message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I think it's a fair price considering its quality and features.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $95 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value is quite a bit higher than that for me. Could you do $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to meet the price of $105. Would you consider $100?
